org.junit.runners

注释类型 Parameterized.UseParametersRunnerFactory


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public static @interface Parameterized.UseParametersRunnerFactory
    Add this annotation to your test class if you want to generate a special runner. You have to specify a ParametersRunnerFactory class that creates such runners. The factory must have a public zero-arg constructor.

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      Class<? extends ParametersRunnerFactory> value 

    • 元素详细资料

      • value

        public abstract Class<? extends ParametersRunnerFactory> value
        返回:
        a ParametersRunnerFactory class (must have a default constructor)
        默认值:
        org.junit.runners.parameterized.BlockJUnit4ClassRunnerWithParametersFactory.class
